subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Boxes!?, we dont need no stinking boxes!!
author: Amy Raiola
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0054_01C760D6.AB244FE0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Would you like us to worry about it for you??  : )

We can throw something =
together about how awesome you and your boxes are... : )

Maybe anyone on h=
ere who has an experience with the box can contribute.  We can make a page =
about first-hand experiences.  I find that anyone who I tell about it finds=
 it very hard to believe, especially with just the little clips you had on =
the site.  People really need to hear the actual stories.  Even then, it'll=
 be hard to believe!  LOL!  I am still having a hard time believing it afte=
r seeing it this weekend!  



  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Fran=
k Sumption<mailto:franks-boxes@...> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<=
mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2007 3:55 PM
=
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Boxes!?, we dont need no stinking boxes!!


  Just try=
ing to be funny, of course we need lots more boxes! that's why I'm 
  too b=
usy to woryy about he site at the moment.

  Frank
